lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to give.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very rewarding.

lender.name: Sarah and Geoff

lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of 25 Technical Analysts.

lender.name: wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I assist individuals become the best they can be.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: I'm also an entrepreneuer and I love helping others get ahead!

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: This seems like the most sensible way to gain equity in the world... those who are fortunate enough to be born into families and societies where they can live easily and comfortably, then lend a hand to others in the world who are not so fortunate. I love the idea that the same $25 can be used again and again, not like a donation.

lender.name: Karen Regan DVM
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to change the world in small gestures.
lender.occupational_info: I am a veterinarian who currently owns the toronto based veterinary practice, the Animal Hospital of High Park. We have dedicated our practice to avian and exotic pets and dogs and cats.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sjors Loomans
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Neil A Hogan
lender.loan_because: I used to be in a similar position and a microloan from family got me started. I'm interested in loaning to people who are trying to *start* a business that could later become a network, though if there aren't any start-ups listed then I'll look at lending to people who plan to dramatically expand or radically change their business.
lender.occupational_info: I write alien stories for children that contain big ideas and metaphysical concepts to stimulate their imagination and encourage them to look at the world differently to previous generations.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Helping others feels good.

lender.name: JSU Peace Builders
lender.loan_because: We lend because we believe in global community service to achieve global peace.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of university students and professors in Jackson, Mississippi USA.

lender.name: zaslots
lender.loan_because: slots, free casino slots, free slots
lender.occupational_info: Have you ever played free slots and won the minute after you started?! This is it!

lender.name: SHiFT
lender.loan_because: SHiFT wants to give something back from what we have achieve and enroll in a more social role, therefore we've created a fund from our conference funding that it's going to be dedicated to enable and help technology related projects thru KIVA all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: SHiFT means Social and Human Ideas for Technology and started as small group of volunteers in Portugal trying to create a conference space where people could discuss and share ideas about the role of technology in everyday life.

lender.name: Oushyn
lender.loan_because: I like the concept that my contribution can help someone in need do whatever matters in their world. it brings us all a little closer.
lender.occupational_info: graphic design for live events.

lender.name: Tiffani
lender.loan_because: Providing the resources I've been blessed with to people who need a dignified way to lift themselves out of poverty is the best way I can think of to offer a hand-up - Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help doctors provide better quality, more compassionate, affordable services to patients.

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate, the world is unfair and I don't think it has to be. I hope these small steps help move the world to a fair global economy for my great grandchildren to be a part of.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: There are many ways one can help, and I have learned that every little bit does count.
lender.occupational_info: We try to improve the use of ICT in rural development working in partnership with governments, international agencies, local institutions, etc.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I like to enable people to make the best out of their lifes.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I'm excited to be a new Kiva lender! 25 dollars means less to me than someone who really needs it across the globe. I like the idea of helping someone succeed rather than giving someone a hand out.

lender.name: Edward Henderson 2nd
lender.loan_because: In Order For Us To Receive What Life Has In Store, We Must First Give.
lender.occupational_info: A Desk Job That Pays The Bills.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others the opportunity to succeed and improve their ability to earn a living so that they can provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I support the computer financial systems and accounting staff at a multinational corporaton. It was through my work that I learned about Kiva!

lender.name: Maciej
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a good way we can change the world one time at a time.

lender.name: Hedli
lender.occupation: Archers Addicts, offical fan club for BBC Radio 4\'

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping to empower others to make positive changes in their lives. I am able to help and am compelled to do so!
lender.occupational_info: I teach Biology and Environmental Science to high school students in rural Pennsylvania.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: People shouldn't be stopped short of managing their own life by a small loan that's needed to sustain them, their family and sometimes a community!

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Empowering small business loans from small stake holders makes good sense.
lender.occupational_info: In my working career, I've built boats and bridges and homes and highways. Not all by myself. Teamwork can build huge projects. Are you ready?

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am lucky. There is no rhyme or reason why I should have been born into this comfortable, North American society and not into a struggling community in the developing world. Any affluence I have, I have by chance -and now I want the chance to share.

lender.name: greg
lender.loan_because: it is worth doing

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have been a fund raiser for charities, professionally and through board and committee involvement now for over twenty years. Micro loans make a macro impact. Who wouldn't want to be a part of that?
lender.occupational_info: I represent small business owners, and understand how capital helps a passionate person make a difference in their life and in their family's.

lender.name: Katelyn
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people move forward.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it's my duty as a human being.

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a helping hand to my fellow world friends and motivate them to reach for their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical esthetician that works for a global skincare company. I currently sell pharmaceutical grade skincare treatment products to doctors and medical spa's in the U.S.A. I cover the North Carolina and South Carolina territories. My company is www.isclinical.com

lender.name: Loquita G
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the people.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because:
I make loans because I feel a call to duty as well as an allegiance to other women of the world who need a hand up, just as others did for me as they helped mold my own early life.
Giving another woman a hand up is the single most indulgent privilege I can think of, and I can attest that through my own giving, in return, I receive a personal joyfulness that is far more valuable than any form of currency or Prada Handbag can ever hope to match.
We must all do what we can to make a affirmative contribution in the world. I hope you will take me up on that challenge and do something that will truly make a significant difference. Instead of a handout, try making a loan that will give another deserving woman a genuine hand up!
Sincerely, Carol
lender.occupational_info:
FOUNDER & WRITER, Paper Eagle Productions Inc.
FOUNDER, Independent Microfinance Incorporated.
FOUNDER, Hope International Incorporated.
FOUNDER, Cellular Angel Technologies Incorporated.

lender.name: ROB
lender.loan_because: As part of our own charitable foundation goals we have identified 'Kiva' as an organization that has great synergies with our own values and one we chose to be involved with.
lender.occupational_info: The ARAGON GROUP is a property developer, business investor and philanthropic organization.

lender.name: Levine
lender.loan_because: I loan because all people deserve a chance in life.

lender.name: Abbigail
lender.loan_because: I believe the current banking system to be a corrupt cartel of greedy scum bags. I do not believe in fractional reserve banking and I will do anything I can to show the world that we do not need the Federal Reserve Banking System to rob us blind for the privledge of employing their worthless paper to facilitate commerce. My families goal is to be entirely self sufficient by producing food and energy, reducing waste and setting a good example for our global community of free individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly play but my daddy is an expert in all phases of construction building materials and techniques. He can build a house from scratch but usually just helps owners and builders determine the exact cost of their projects before they begin production.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me and I am passing it along.
lender.occupational_info: I gave up my job to become the full-time caregiver for my Mother, who has Alzheimer's.

lender.name: Benji & Avis
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have started a natural health business and we need to purchase merchandise to have stocked and on hand for our customers, along with some office furniture, office equipment like a newer pc as well as a laptop when we we are mobile.
lender.occupational_info: I Avis have become an independent contractor like secret shopper, consumer product tester, focus group, translator and internet researcher since I have been injured on the job. I presently work at home most of the time and at my own pace. I am trying to expand my natural health business as soon as possible. My husband and I need to get this business on track ASAP, because we no longer have any pensions to retire to.

lender.name: AJC
lender.loan_because: I can...
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer for a number of local and national non-profit organizations while I chase my two preschool age children around the city.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in some of the countries I've visited around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I sell building materials.

lender.name: Anastasia
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to impact the world in a positive way, and helping people help themselves is one of the best ways to do that!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people
lender.occupational_info: I move cargo across the United States by truck

lender.name: Ben
lender.occupation: Post Production Supervisor for feature films
lender.loan_because: I always had the direct debits for Oxfam or Greenpeace etc, but really wondered if my money was making a difference. Kiva is smart, transparent and I feel involved- I love it.
lender.occupational_info: I help filmmakers get from the camera shoot to the final film that you see on movie screens. I love my work.

lender.name: John and Cathy
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to make a life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Design heating and cooling systems for industrial use.

lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair go.

lender.name: nora

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I am happy to share the blessings I receive, especially to contribute for empowerment of fellow entrepreneurs... so why not? :-)
lender.occupational_info: I help New Zealand small businesses, self-employed people, and non-profit organizations getting their websites via http://WebGeneralNZ.com. I also provide a free service setting up self-hosted blogs for people around the world via http://BlogSetupHelp.com.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I choose to help others, pretty simple.

lender.name: Annie & Andrew
lender.loan_because: We received an inheritance from an extremely hard-working and generous grandfather. He would be so proud that we were using his money to help people in Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I study wild animals in Tanzania (Kigoma) and I teach college students. My husband owns his own business.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to succeed, and hopefully through this success to live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Do you remember the Exxon Valdez oil spill in Alaska? Back then the USA was not prepared to handle catastrophes of this magnitude. I work for a US Coast Guard organization that is responsible for managing a trust fund that is used to respond to oil spill incidents in the waters of the USA

lender.loan_because: I want to do the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: I help events and people be viewed live on the web throughout the world.

lender.name: RenÃ©e
lender.loan_because: I believe that enabling independent businessmen and businesswomen to succeed is the most effective way to impact developing economies. I believe that individual help, not monies that get side-tracked by corrupt governments, will make the biggest difference to people and to the future.

lender.name: DemeterInteractive

lender.occupational_info: My family own a cattle ranch in Australia.

lender.occupational_info: I sell land in mexico. and i also repossess cars here in the usa. repossess: the bank contacts me when the payments are not being made and i go get the car/truck back for the bank.

lender.name: Thad
lender.loan_because: it feels good, it's easy and it's effective.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Those with the means should give to others who are without.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an aerospace company designing cabin interiors. My group builds the software that controls much of the lighting, passenger address, and interphone system on the airplane.

lender.name: Landon K Lobb
lender.loan_because: I don't believe in charity. However, I do believe that no matter where someone is born, they should have the opportunity to live a healthy and productive life.

lender.name: Kimberley
lender.loan_because: it's great to see other people pursuing their entrepreneurial dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I study how people are using the forest in Interior Alaska for picking things such as berries, firewood, and birch bark.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: people all around the world are looking for ways to make a living to support their family and I only hope that my small contribution helps.
lender.occupational_info: The Office Grind

lender.name: Roger
lender.occupational_info: Born in a Barn Studio is a long established business offering 1st class recordings on a Pro Tools HD rig to clients throughout the local area and across the UK. The company, which is based in Ansty (just north of Coventry), originally started in 2004 but the owner has over 15 years experience in the music industry generally and has worked on the road with many top names in the past. Catering for bands, ensembles, soloists the studio is very diverse in its nature and boasts the largest live room in the midlands. With overnight accommodation this studio is the ideal hideaway for music creativity. Born in a Barn Studio is owned by Roger Greasby and has a growing team of freelance engineers. Roger was qualified to degree level in 1992 and passed a diploma in music at age 17. However the best experience any producer can gain is hands-on, veryday troubleshooting and final mastering experience. Born in a Barn Studio has an expanding customer base, located in and around Coventry, including many local bands and acoustic groups. A growing corporate side to the business now is evident and it undertakes larger projects if required. Clients include Birmingham StageSchool, The West Midlands Police Brass Band and countless bands / groups such as The Rrrs(Warwick Uni), Half of Nothing(Coventry), Ist(Leicester), Dear Superstar(Manchester), The Void(Coventry), Vigilante Wing(Chesterfield), Temba(London) to name a few. The firm offers comprehensive recording services to bands / groups / agents and businesses, which are designed to be cost effective for everyone. With a custom built studio (in old milking parlour style premises on 1 level), the business is ideal for a diverse range of situations and also has experienced staff allowing clients to fully relax into their music. A full mastering service is offered to new clients and duplication services are available through good local contacts. Any bands wanting to record over the weekend also have the option of getting a gig in Coventry with local venues.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: I want to help if only in a small way
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day

lender.name: JULIE
lender.loan_because: lots of people deserve help.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and articles about how to prepare for natural disasters like earthquakes and floods.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: ... I'm able to.

lender.name: James & Florence
lender.loan_because: We can help. It is extending the hand of help to make the world a better place. Who knows, perhaps it will in some way lead to world peace?
lender.occupational_info: James is 5 yrs and Flossie is 2 yrs old. The thought of people struggling in the world upsets them. They spend most of the day playing, laughing and at kinder!

lender.name: Maggy
lender.loan_because: I want to! I loan with Kiva because I can be spontaneous and because I'm a freelance so money comes in lumps rather than regularly.
lender.occupational_info: I write books on spirituality and prosperity consciousness. I used to be very poor myself and very in debt and I discovered that if you focused on joy, financial benefit would come too. It's all in the old religious texts but not very well understood. I want to help people understand that there's a lot they can do to help themselves.

lender.name: Lianne
lender.loan_because: life is richer when we share what we have and what we know, and leave our hearts and ears open to new experiences.
lender.occupational_info: I help business people put their best foot forward using my creative skills to help them attract people to their product or service.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: I believe that market-based approaches to development have real potential to make a sustainable difference.
lender.occupational_info: My research aims to make the world an easier more delightful place to be in through designing better technology and systems.

lender.name: Ivona
lender.loan_because: I would like to help anyone who is in the need of financing to make the most of their business idea.

lender.name: Asger
lender.loan_because: it helps people in improving their own life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an economics student.

lender.name: LucÃ­a
lender.loan_because: I want to help to carry on the work of this people and i think is important to give them the opportunity to built their future.

lender.name: Macy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other individuals.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: My brother introduced me to the concept, and it seems like such a simple way to reach out to the world, to try to do some good.
lender.occupational_info: I find and make furniture and other items to use in performances of various kinds of plays. I also help organize and coordinate all the people who work on plays, to make sure it all comes together.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want people every where to be self sufficient and have a good life.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people a chance to make their way in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design devices used for hearing research.

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: As a self employed, I know how it's difficult to be raised correctly and how important is it for starting and succeeding in a business.

lender.name: TCU Opportunity
lender.loan_because: we, a student-led organization at Texas Christian University, feel that micro-financing is the best way to fight poverty.
lender.occupational_info: To spread awareness of and raise money for the cause of micro-financing -- "pulling poverty up by its bootstraps"

lender.name: Grade 6 Service Learning
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be successful in their businesses and lives. Some people are not as fortunate as we are and they just need a helping hand. Even though we're kids, we can still help!
lender.occupational_info: In Service Learning we do all sorts of projects to help others such as recycling, educating others about proper care for animals, collecting and donating cell phones, caring for our groundwater, donating to PlayPumps in Africa, and cleaning up our own little town. We have done fundraisers for many organizations over the years and we hope this donation to Kiva will pass through many entrepreneurs' hands.

lender.name: klopo
lender.loan_because: gambling, no deposit casinos, free casino
lender.occupational_info: Can you feel it in my skin, can you feel it, baby? It's the no deposit casinos feelingl

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I believe it is an effective way to help small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I use genetics, and molecular biology to understand the biological and clinical diversity of human tumors. This information helps guide clinical trial design and biomarker development in order to identify more optimal treatment regimens for cancer patients.

lender.name: Pebbles
lender.loan_because: I believe that each of us can make a difference. Let's heal our world, one step at a time. A blessing shared is a blessing gained.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to support people in countries I've visited to be able to build up their own business and get some more freedom.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is possible to make a change.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university teacher and researcher in the field of English language.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back. I believe in empowering people and specifically women to take control of their lives. I want to help provide an opportunity for others, and in so doing maybe they can change their world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to understand the health of the mouth influences the health of the whole body.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help others live their dream of building their own business and this is one small way that I can give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help others understand how to budget, plan for income when they stop working and understand how to save.

lender.name: Slater
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have been born into circumstances and an environment in which I was highly favored to succeed. After serving in the US military for several years, I've seen first hand what I knew to be true: not everyone is born into an environment in which their success is favored. I believe that Kiva allows me to help level the playing field and provide an advantage to those who desire more than what their circumstances may have otherwise offered.
lender.occupational_info: I look at what my business does and how it does it through a variety of measurements. If I see areas that could use improvement or are successes, I inform the owner in order to rectify the problem or to highlight the success.

lender.name: seniwati
lender.loan_because: banks won't.
lender.occupational_info: I work with co-operatives and credit unions. I volunteer my time in support of mothers who want to breastfeed, as well as in support of good nutrition, excellence in education and promotion of reading and literature.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: Everyone derserves a chance and a choice to be free of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I Learn Things.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: God gave me the gift of being born in a country with the lion's share of the earth's financial resources. It is wrong of me NOT to take care of my fellow human being.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the day to day financial aspects of a professional society of 25,000 attorneys.

lender.name: dolce
lender.loan_because: slots machines, slots, free slots, casino
lender.occupational_info: Try to stay there when the big casino slots machine prize is on! Play your chance and win!

lender.name: AnamCara
lender.loan_because: I can't imagine why anyone would not!? A small seed for such a potentially huge flower!! Discovering this concept brought tears to my eyes and insiration back into my heart...I am SOLD! Good luck to all! xo
lender.occupational_info: I too am a single mother, but only have 1 beautiful child not 4. I too work full-time but for me that means 8 hrs, with great benefits. I too have lived below the poverty line, but as a Canadian that has never meant a lack of food, clothing, shelter, medicine (or even the fear of). For most of us in Canada there is an abundance of helping hands when you need it, as even our struggling citizens live better than many worldwide. Through such a brilliant concept, I hope we all can be a part of the solution to alleviate poverty Everywhere! A lofty goal but as I read somewhere on this site "Shoot for the moon, if you miss you'll end up in the stars." Thanks Kiva for allowing us to be part of something so much greater than ourselves!

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: it's help that keeps on helping. And because credit is the key to upward mobility.
lender.occupational_info: I study to better myself, so I can go out and contribute to the growing, changing world.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I need a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I have an after-school program to help children ages 4-10 read, mentorship and provide snacks. I need a loan for a building to rent and van to provide pick up after school.

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: Every single action counts

lender.name: Fabian Mohr
lender.loan_because: i believe that small entrepreneurs need our support, not regimes or corporations.

lender.name: Nur
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone who is less fortunate than me
lender.occupational_info: Research grant administration at the University of British Columbia

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I help the people around achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Making the world a better place!

lender.name: Sean Gartland
lender.loan_because: I Care

lender.name: John
lender.occupation: A photographer by night and an accountant by day.
lender.loan_because: Empowerment, it is a beautiful thing!
lender.occupational_info: I'd like to think that I am a photographer to justify the time & expense I've put forth. But, I am sure that my boss prefers I call myself an accountant.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I think the worst thing standing between an idea and its success is the lack of money.

lender.name: shane
lender.loan_because: I want to give back when I've been so blessed in my life. It's great to have a great tool like this to be able to share.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: -Help others to help themselves -empower other women involved in ag-
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I just purchased our small farm. We have a goat dairy-taking care of breeding, feeding, kidding, milking and everything else. We also produce free range eggs and honey.

lender.occupation: Youth programing coordinator for an NGO

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I know how important a few dollars can be...

lender.name: Felicity
lender.loan_because: I've been given amazing opportunities, and I'm lucky I can give back in even a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small farm in southern Australia where I run Merino sheep for wool & store lambs

lender.name: Antares
lender.loan_because: Of those to whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student in nursing school who plans to use my skills for a non-profit organization someday. .

lender.name: Duanne
lender.occupational_info: Own my own electrical construction company.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I have additional currency and I know that others do not. I hope that someday when I am in need someone will take care of me in return for my kindness now.
lender.occupational_info: I do what I can for people world-wide.

lender.name: Trinidad
lender.occupation: Manufacture, sale and distribution of wooden palle
lender.loan_because: In our country, unfortunately we do not have opportunities, people especially the elderly to access a loan because they think that we are no longer useful to society. With my children we have created a small company so our job is to make pallets for the export of various products of our country. But we do not have enough money to buy the wood out of our city, Guayaquil, as if it would be so much more convenient and our business may be a little more and could help others to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Our job is to make processed wood (including pallets of bananas for export). If we had the opportunity to buy infrastructure, surely we could get some places to sell our product in different banana exporters that are in our country.

lender.name: 1A.NET
lender.occupational_info: Germanyâs information portal about the statutory and private health insurance "1A Krankenversicherung" provides visitors with the latest health insurance market news, insurance tests, price comparison and address lists of the insurance companies. The website also contains additional information on health topics, such as an encyclopedia, useful guidelines on diseases and best deals. A complete list of all German health insurance companies is available on the site. The information portal 1A Krankenversicherung is one of the most popular German websites of its kind. -- Deutschlands Verbraucherportal 1A Krankenversicherung informiert aktuell Ã¼ber Gesetzliche Krankenkassen und die Private Krankenversicherung. Neben tÃ¤glichen Nachrichten zum Gesundheitswesen werden Ratgeber, Krankenkassen Adressen, Testberichte zu Versicherungen, Preisvergleiche und ein umfangreiches Versicherungslexikon zur Krankenversicherung angeboten. Das Portal verÃ¶ffentlicht zudem eine regelmÃ¤Ãig aktualisierte Liste aller Krankenversicherungen in Deutschland. 1A Krankenversicherung ist eines der reichweitenstÃ¤rksten Angebote dieser Art in Deutschland.
